Question: However, this person did not have the resources to repurchase the book.
Hints: Perhaps as early as 1787, this person began to write poems, stories, and plays for her own and her family's amusement.
This person acquired the remainder of her education by reading books, guided by her father and her brothers James and Henry.
Around the start of the 20th century, members of the literary elite reacted against the popularization of this person.
